title: Book, "Componimenti Poetici pel Solenne Ingresso alla Dignita di Procurator di S. Marco di Sua Eccelenza Il Signor D. Lodovico Rezzonico Cavalier, nella Stamperia Zatta", 1762
medium: Black and red ink engraving on laid paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. James O. Green and Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Poetry for the solemn entrance of Lodovico Rezzonico into the office of Procurator of San Marco. 
Small folio. Engraved title-page in black and red ink; full page engraving facing title-page. Each subsequent page ornamented with frames containing figures, trophies, garlands, putti, animals, rocaille, chinoiserie, vignettes.
